page.title: 07TYNDALES FARM
page.content: This is a satellite farm.Mr Wolton, the owner lives at his chief farm at Buttsbury,near Ingatestone.He began life as a farm boy,became a foreman, then a manager.Finally he bought his own farm and then Tyndales 4 years ago which is run by his son who was educated at Writtle agricultural college.The wheat he grows is used for cattle feeding which is exported from Tilbury and Milling Wheat for which Allied Mills group company,find buyers He has deliveries of fertilizers once a week.He also grows barley and oil seed rape.Seed is sown from the last week in September till mid October and harvested the following August.He buys 4fifths of his seed and reclaims 1fifth which is called 1st generation. This combination prevents hybrids developing. Mr.Wolton looks upon his work as a way of life.
